name: Stable
content:
Stable

Source CRB.277

Related @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.bPDAhCFEP5Jvybhg]{Conditions}

If you were @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.4MxAK5uS0zMNWhUK]{Dying} but spent Resolve Points to stabilize (see Using Resolve Points beginning on page 250 in Injury and Death), or if you received healing from an ally, you are @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.H51jmhxF9XuwDOE7]{Stable}. You are no longer dying, but you are still @Compendium[sfrpg.conditions.lf8pbezocjYIvR9y]{Unconscious}.
